channel.title: HAMTRACKZ PRODUCTIONS
channel.description:
HamTrackz Productions is created to allow music artists have the creative freedom of expressing themselves through audio artform. It has been in existance since 2011 by Chazaray "CHAZZAM' Tolbert who has been in the industry for over 7 years, starting his music engineering at QUEENCITY (Charlotte, NC) and then assisted in the prodution for artists affiliated with 4DAFAM ENTERTAINMENT (Macon, GA).
HAMTRACKZ PRODUCTIONS has been involved in the community by volunteering with recording artist TIA MICHELLE at TWIN CEDARS (Macon, GA), an organization for troubled children, by introducing the children their to express themselves through song instead of violence.
With a roster of artists including JALON BLACC, ROCK and TIA MICHELLE, they have a variety of tracks to complement any genre of music to compliment the artists vision and personality. Just remember that we only except business from individuals who are willing to GO HARD, OR GO HOME!!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Give it a listen!
channel.itunes:author: HAMTRACKZ PRODUCTIONS / BIGG REDD PUBLISHING
